title: Future Stories
body:
Hey folks! What new stories would you like to hear / read about in Runeterra? Whether it's featuring a champion you like, exploring a region you want to see more of, or seeing what happens next in a story beat - what would you love to read? 

(For this question, think more in terms of a short-ish story, a la Homebound, than anything that would be told in novel or feature-film length mediums!)

https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/homebound/

Wow this is a BIG question!

I wanna see what Twisted Fate and Graves are up to after their reunion. It's been so long since we were updated about them!

I think Quinn and Valor would benefit from more stories about their time in enemy territory. I REALLY like what you guys did even with that brief description about them in the Book. Valor and Quinn together are two of the most capable champions that demacia has and the intrigue of being across the borders of enemies? exciting.

An update on Skarner would be nice. I wanna see him progress and learn and gain allies. Janna is another interesting one. I really liked her color story about her and the boy she protected. I think there's a lot of room to tell more stories of her heroism and perhaps of her struggles. I'd like to see a story from HER point of view.

Also! Jax and Fiora met! I MUST know what happened as a result of their duel. jax is looking for capable fighters to help him. Did Fiora live up to his standards? Did he live up to hers????? I gotta know.

I'd also like to hear more stories about what the Aspects are up to. Last we heard, Diana was trying to exterminate the Void's influence and I'd like to see what her and all of the other Aspects are up to. Are their paths unified in purpose? What beautiful thing is Taric protecting!!!??

Nami is another big one. Her last story was so funny, meeting the villagers. Loved her interactions.

Orianna's journey into understanding humanity and her own form is interesting. I wonder what would happen if she met up with Camille, or even Viktor? What would those conversations be like.

Where is Ivern? What is he doing?

This is JUST me being greedy, but Syndra! Girl what!!! The will of Ionia itself had her sleeping! Soraka was passing out visions about her! A man died to ensure she would not awaken but she DID! Will she make allies? enemies? What will sate her rage! and let's talk about her warped magic that basically causes magical cancer! I just need more from muh girl.

Varus. What are my favorite two gays and demon up to? And the other Darkin for that matter. I want to hear more about Aatrox's "sister".

Veigar's story was extremely funny and I could use more of that particular brand of humor.

And frankly I just want more start guardian stories.

Please continue the Shurima line. There is so much left untouched regarding Taliyah, Azir, Xerath, Sivir, everything needs to have the build up that we've been left on. Shurima affects so many places and that story was stopped after Taliyah was seen in Homecoming. PLZZZ
Knowing anything about Talon would be nice

I honestly want to hear more about what Xerath has been up to, along with how Jax is still alive after all this time. Also stories for some characters we don't hear from much. What are Bard and Ivern doing right now.

I know Kindred may be a belief and at the time was said to just be one representation of it, but are they actually doing anything in the world, same with Kench?

Feels like theres a good number of characters that feel like they've just been sitting around I'd like to here more about than the usual pop champs

I'm late to the party but...

please, please, PLEASE, do something with Vayne{{champion:67}} . She feels so out of date and honestly I feel like she could have some serious potential, especially since fiddlesticks is lurking around the corner. Her lore (from what I've read anyway) blurs the line as to whether she's a (anti?) hero or a villain for someone that hunts those that do dark arts, black magic and demons, and personally it just feels edgy for the sake of it. It also feels weird for someone to have such popularity as well as having a record of pulling 1v5s, yet doesn't have an animation of her own (again, fiddlesticks vs vayne, just putting it out there). 

Also a Lucian and Vayne (being a substitute for Senna I guess) short of hunting monsters (or a new horror/demon/dark arts champ) would be absolutely badass. Please give her more of a personality to understand rather then "Edgy Witcher 2.0". What was her ties with her parents? Does she have nightmares of the demon that killed them? What did her mentor remind her of her mother? Does she have connections due to her families wealthy reputation? Does she follow a code on killing those with dark arts or does she kill them just for the sake of it? Is she a lone wolf or is there someone giving her contracts for the next target?

There are many, many, many questions that need to be answered for Vayne and personally I believe there is serious potential just waiting to be discovered for her.

She also could use a visual upgrade, just an fyi (hint hint).

I really want to hear about Yorick's Adventures around the shadow isles. I really enjoyed the stuff you gave him already, but I really want to hear more about his life in the Shadow Isles now. I think it would be really cool to hear this as a parallel to his life as a monk. Maybe there are monk-like things he does that are similar to the things he does now.

Also, I'd love to hear a story with Kayn interacting with Akali. I enjoy the idea of highly skilled people leaving orders they had known for their entire lives. It would be cool to see them chat and then to find out that they were from rival clans.
